display_long_description:
SWARM 2, the highly anticipated sequel to NYX's "BEST META QUEST VR GAME"  is an electrifying rogue-like shooter. 

With epic new environments, intoxicating rogue-like progression, and globally competitive leaderboards - this is what VR is really made for!


**RECLAIM A WORLD OVERRUN**

As Marv, the last surviving grapple commando, you’ll use your trusty pistol and grappling hook to battle back the Swarm and save Earth - with style! - while growing stronger and unraveling more of the story with each unique mission to the surface. [media]


**TRANSFORM INTO A LEGENDARY HERO**

With Auggie's help, harness revolutionary Shard Tech to permanently upgrade your skills. Choose among dozens of perks to find the perfect combination and turn the tide of war.[media]



**BUILT FOR REPLAYABILITY**

Every mission brings unexpected challenges as you navigate through the neon-lit ruins of Earth, now a constantly changing battleground. Each encounter with the Swarm is a unique experience, with tactics and strategies evolving to match your growing skills. [media]

**SIGNATURE SMOOTH GRAPPLING SYSTEM**

Swarm’s Signature Smooth Grappling System turns you into a dynamic pendulum; master the art of building momentum by swooping close to the ground and timing your swings to perfection.  [media]

Intense. Demanding. Exhilarating.

**This is SWARM 2.**



[media]

With epic new environments, intoxicating rogue-like progression, and globally competitive leaderboards - this is what VR is really made for!


**RECLAIM A WORLD OVERRUN**

As Marv, the last surviving grapple commando, you’ll use your trusty pistol and grappling hook to battle back the Swarm and save Earth - with style! - while growing stronger and unraveling more of the story with each unique mission to the surface. ![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39031569_1159677598472976_810858379197661666_n.mp4?_nc_cat=104&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=PEeebSGAw1EQ7kNvwFlo60P&_nc_oc=Adm17gYncZA8RDrRUouCCVg0-8sQKYsLD4FqE9b6W9Wu6U9CLSn7sHmTI-kLTZtnVC4&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=93zz4FxksYhA4KWR-TL9vQ&oh=00_AfnmKi-7voURpG9AK4HUnfheVZAWg_WYRh5Xw7g1Y3MUpg&oe=694C4796)


**TRANSFORM INTO A LEGENDARY HERO**

With Auggie's help, harness revolutionary Shard Tech to permanently upgrade your skills. Choose among dozens of perks to find the perfect combination and turn the tide of war.![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75439601_1283604596339092_1626885398679824555_n.mp4?_nc_cat=106&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=K_M-Z8yT7esQ7kNvwHhXzuc&_nc_oc=AdkW2_m3uj8CqA7B0c712Tp-LNhhiVzZGTYdzcgyr4gzhtXOD-v4UHEgVGN0pvCjgDg&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=93zz4FxksYhA4KWR-TL9vQ&oh=00_AfkjrlGi_xQ8LaEs3itw63xAzimOob5JPV5W7vg78gEVLg&oe=694C1B6C)



**BUILT FOR REPLAYABILITY**

Every mission brings unexpected challenges as you navigate through the neon-lit ruins of Earth, now a constantly changing battleground. Each encounter with the Swarm is a unique experience, with tactics and strategies evolving to match your growing skills. ![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982547_414026104680350_1590790586923082496_n.mp4?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=-DZfMPW8UoIQ7kNvwHoK0O0&_nc_oc=Adler4ggOnHY7QThHk9jsWiVgEv-_o8RUSYBJDZMzOuaJnGA1KRv_BTT2UwMmZS-2XA&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=93zz4FxksYhA4KWR-TL9vQ&oh=00_AfkC1avkMJPRFQbAhEf41FLL7PNAtr7yf6pD_BSgD-IBgQ&oe=694C3F32)

**SIGNATURE SMOOTH GRAPPLING SYSTEM**

Swarm’s Signature Smooth Grappling System turns you into a dynamic pendulum; master the art of building momentum by swooping close to the ground and timing your swings to perfection.  ![{"height":720,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/57569452_1204316914209794_1314769465083168968_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=QU3UC6INjl8Q7kNvwHREhKu&_nc_oc=AdmQXDUji1zk3JQO9-qbK-h-j9rLaNL-8SQCpBjNiWKN8sypkG_RhdcqasXs11KpwrY&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=93zz4FxksYhA4KWR-TL9vQ&oh=00_AflfA77l8X3njqh6zHfDAwIQsunAtR8J2fXqVgFSMX_g-w&oe=694C414C)

Intense. Demanding. Exhilarating.

**This is SWARM 2.**
